```json
{
    "ability": "Commander",
    "effect": "When the Pokémon enters battle, if an ally has Tatsugiri, Tatsugiri jumps into the ally's mouth and this Pokémon's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed stats are boosted.",
    "synergies": ["Tatsugiri", "Dondozo"],
    "notes": "Exclusive to Dondozo. Tatsugiri must be an active ally on the field when Dondozo is sent out to trigger. Tatsugiri remains in Dondozo's mouth until Dondozo faints or switches out."
}
```
